funcs.name: json_encode
funcs.desc: Returns a string containing the JSON representation of value.

return.desc: Returns a JSON encoded string on success.

args.name: value
args.desc:
The value being encoded. Can be any type except a resource.

This function only works with UTF-8 encoded data.

args.name: options
args.desc: Bitmask consisting of JSON_HEX_QUOT, JSON_HEX_TAG, JSON_HEX_AMP, JSON_HEX_APOS, JSON_FORCE_OBJECT.

funcs.name: json_decode
funcs.desc: Takes a JSON encoded string and converts it into a PHP variable.

return.desc: Returns the value encoded in json in appropriate PHP type. Values true, false and null (case-insensitive) are returned as TRUE, FALSE and NULL respectively. NULL is returned if the json cannot be decoded or if the encoded data is deeper than the recursion limit.

args.name: json
args.desc:
The json string being decoded.

This function only works with UTF-8 encoded data.

args.name: assoc
args.desc: When TRUE, returned objects will be converted into associative arrays.
